item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 23rd April
item.description:

item.title: Conifer Trees, 23rd April
item.description:
One large conifer tree that has split into two on the painswick road other side of fence of property 20E Castle Hill Drive. Can this tree be removed as it has grown very tall and could result in splitting further causing problems.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Painswick Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
